pages.text: Your introduction to the power of the alien race, the My'ri, and their magical powers is through the remains of the My'ri themselves. The My'ri, are tall thin digitigrade aliens, with deep connections to their natural surroundings allowing them to harness the powers of the elements around them. Having already conquered and settled many worlds, the My'ri search for a new world to explore with new elements to harness to increase their knowledge and strength.

pages.name: My'ri
pages.text: You will find useful materials for new spell crafting found on the corpses of the My'ri and stashed within their crashed ships.
